NewsArticle.Title: Developer Chat on PlanetDA on November 4th!
NewsArticle.Content: On November 4th at 3 PM PST, The DA Team will join with players in a one-hour live chat on PlanetDA. Have questions about the new Dark Ages 5.51, or other past, current and future developments in Dark Ages? Then join PlanetDA and the Dark Ages Team for this chat. Visit Planet DA <a href="http://www.planetda.net" target=0>here<a/> for details!
